statements: SELECT * FROM security_events;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description FROM security_events;
SELECT event_id, event_timestamp, event_source FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Login';
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type='Login' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_description, event_source FROM security_events WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND event_timestamp < '2022-01-02 00:00:00' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_source FROM security_events WHERE event_type='Authentication' AND event_source='Server'
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_type='Authorization' OR event_type='Access Control' LIMIT 5
SELECT event_id, event_timestamp, event_source FROM security_events WHERE event_description LIKE '%error%' AND event_source != 'Internal'
SELECT * FROM security_events;
SELECT event_id, event_timestamp, event_type FROM security_events;
SELECT event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_type='Login';
SELECT event_timestamp, event_type FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_timestamp, incident_type, incident_description FROM incident_response;
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Cyber Attack' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM incident_response;
SELECT incident_type, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM incident_response GROUP BY incident_type;
SELECT * FROM security_events JOIN incident_response ON security_events.event_id = incident_response.incident_id;
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM security_events;
SELECT * FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM security_events WHERE event_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31';
SELECT threat_name, detection_time FROM threat_detection WHERE threat_name LIKE '%ransomware%' ORDER BY detection_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-10-01';
SELECT event_name, event_timestamp FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT incident_type, incident_timestamp FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY incident_timestamp ASC;
SELECT threat_name, detection_time FROM threat_detection WHERE threat_name LIKE '%ransomware%' ORDER BY detection_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_events se JOIN security_incidents si ON se.event_id = si.incident_id;
SELECT * FROM security_events;
SELECT incident_type, incident_description FROM incidents WHERE severity_level > 5;
SELECT event_timestamp, event_type, event_description FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM response_actions WHERE action_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(detection_score) AS avg_score FROM threat_detection;
SELECT * FROM security_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT incident_type, incident_description FROM incidents WHERE severity_level > 5;
SELECT detection_type, COUNT(*) AS total_detections FROM threat_detection GROUP BY detection_type;
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'login' AND event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT action_type FROM response_actions ORDER BY action_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityEvents;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM SecurityEvents ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_description FROM SecurityEvents WHERE event_type='Login';
SELECT * FROM Incidents WHERE incident_severity > 5;
SELECT username, email, user_role FROM Users WHERE user_role='Admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityEvents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_severity FROM Incidents WHERE incident_severity > 5;
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_location FROM Devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT username, email, user_role FROM Users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM Responses WHERE response_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY response_timestamp DESC;
